body:
I am pretty new to Spack, I am not sure if what I am asking about makes sense.

I have written the python.py for our package, and I can install our package properly for myself. I want to share it with my teammates, but not sure how should we do it. For now, I just ask them to call `spack create ` and then copy-paste my python.py into the auto formed one. I wonder if there is a better way to do it?

Thanks a lot!
title: How other can use created package
